akas: The Vice Guide to Everything (original title)
akas from release info: The Vice Guide to Everything (original title)

1.title: Yemen/Neomelodics/Fantasy Coffins/DIY Strip Clubs

episode of.title: The Vice Guide to Everything (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: Shane Smith and Spike Jonze hop on a plane to Yemen. We go to Naples hang with the mob minstrels. Thomas Morton, tries to figure out which kind of African fantasy coffin we want to get buried in.

2.title: North Korea/Russian Mobsters/Border Crossings/Dating a Girl in a Burqa

episode of.title: The Vice Guide to Everything (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: We sneak into North Korea and send Ryan Duffy to Moscow to hang out with a Russian Mobster. Thomas Morton visits an attraction where people can pretend to illegally cross the Mexican border and Shane hangs with Yemeni teenagers.

3.title: Vale Tudo/Ramallah Street Racing/Fake Afghanistan/Die Antwoord

episode of.title: The Vice Guide to Everything (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: We go to the slums of Brazil to see where MMA comes from. Thomas heads to the Israeli-occupied territory of the West Bank, where bored Palestinian youth steal Israeli cars, trick them out in chop shops and go racing in the streets of Ramallah.

4.title: The Business of War/The Bulletproof Tailor/Sakawa Boys/Norwegian Black Metal

episode of.title: The Vice Guide to Everything (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: In this episode, we sneak into SOFEX.Then, it's off to Ghana to experience Sakawa. We trek to Colombia and get shot by the Bulletproof Tailor. Finally, we see inside the scariest music scene in the world, Norwegian Black Metal.

5.title: Narco Cinema/Apartheid Town/Sewers of Bogota/Korean Boy Bands

episode of.title: The Vice Guide to Everything (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: "The Vice Guide To Narco Cinema" features movies that are driven by America's epic drug demand. Suroosh Alvi, and Bernardo go to Apartheid Town. Thomas Morton goes to live with the homeless in Bogota. We learn about K-Pop, Korean pop music in Korea.

6.title: Dancehall/Border Militias/Pakistan Gun Markets/Indian Call Centers

episode of.title: The Vice Guide to Everything (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: In Jamaica we learn about dancehall music. We see how Darra, Pakistan has now transformed into the largest Taliban stronghold in the region. On the Arizona border we patrol the US/Mexico border. Finally, we go to an Indian Call Center in Bangalore.

7.title: Liberia/Lowriders/Libya/Based Music

episode of.title: The Vice Guide to Everything (TV Series 2010– )

7.plot: Shane Smith heads to Liberia to meet the former General Butt Naked. Then we head off to the heroin overdose and low rider capital of the country. We attend the "International Youth Day," in Libya. We go to California to learn about Based Music.

8.title: Poppy Palaces/Huayno Murders/Sri Lankan Child Soldiers/Reindeer Racing

episode of.title: The Vice Guide to Everything (TV Series 2010– )

8.plot: We go on a real estate tour of the Poppy Palaces in Afghanistan. Then Ryan Duffy visits the world of Huayno music. Thomas Morton goes to Sri Lanka to see ex-Tamil Child Soldiers. Finally, we go to Norway to race reindeer and make moonshine.

imdb.plot outline: When Vice magazine first started, all it cared about was sex, drugs, and rock 'n roll. But as it started traveling around the world, it got more into politics, culture, fashion, art, the environment. Basically, everything - The Vice Guide To Everything.
imdb.title: The Vice Guide to Everything
plot: When Vice magazine first started, all it cared about was sex, drugs, and rock 'n roll. But as it started traveling around the world, it got more into politics, culture, fashion, art, the environment. Basically, everything - The Vice Guide To Everything.
